name: Omon Tetha
description:
Zareth Thak, a great desert in the western lands of Omon Tetha, is revered as the domain of a powerful necromancer. During a long journey through the desert, the wizard-artificer Iralgodan has been captured by the necromancer.

Unknown to the necromancer, the wizard is in possesion of Omnistoran — a set of dice. Rolling these dice grant the wielder mana of various aspects.

Alone in the dungeons of Usubad you prepare your escape.

Controls
Movement -  WASD
Cast spell - Left click
Roll die - Right click
Cycle selected spell - Tab
